page.title: 17 Housing - Eastham,Hooton
page.content: In Eastham and Hooton there are many different types of houses. If you travel into Eastham Village you will see rows of cottages, particularly near the church.Some of these are very old.There are also rows of Victorian terrace houses where the front doors are separated by a wall.They were built like that to stop the women gossiping on the front step. Very recently, old stables near the church have been modernised and made into new cottages. There is also a variety of private housing, mainly semi-detached and high priced detached. Hooton is only a small place and most of its housing is private.These consist of terrace houses,semi- detached and detached which vary in price considerably.
